description.value:
Pauper

You’ve been on your own for a while, perhaps even for as long as you can remember. Growing up in the streets without a coin to your name was hard, but through your strength, speed, wits, willpower, or a combination of each you were able to survive.

Ability Score Increase. One ability score of your choice increases by 1.

Thieves' Cant. You know how to communicate through Thieves’ Cant (See Rogue). @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.ATTNSKPSEZCNUNS0]{Thieves' Cant}

Skills. Choose two from: Deception, Perception, Performance, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Survival.

Tools. You gain proficiency with one of the following: Disguise kit, Thieves’ tools, or a musical instrument.

Languages. Common.
